sections.heading: Short title. This Article may be cited as the Special Commission on Gynecologic Cancers Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Article may be cited as the Special Commission on Gynecologic Cancers Act.

sections.heading: Repeal. This Article is repealed on January 1, 2028.
sections.text: Repeal. This Article is repealed on January 1, 2028.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
